title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document detailed project requirements for SecureDataSandbox. This includes, but is not limited to: security considerations, performance goals, integration with existing systems, scalability needs, potential data handling restrictions due to privacy or regulatory concerns, and a roadmap for phased deployment and iterative improvements.

title: Design System Architecture for SecureDataSandbox
description: Design the overall architecture of the secure data sandbox, including components, communication protocols, security mechanisms (such as encryption and access control), data flow, and isolation strategies (e.g., virtualization or containerization technologies like Docker). Consider optimizing for scalability, high availability, and fault tolerance. Define monitoring and logging mechanisms for security auditing, incident response, and performance tuning. Ensure secure file transfer protocols are used for both internal and external data transfers. For internal communication within the sandbox, consider gRPC or another secure RESTful API. Document the architecture design in the project's technical documentation.

title: Implement Sandbox Environment
description: Develop the core sandbox environment, including virtualization, isolation, and resource management.

title: Develop Security Mechanisms
description: Implement security mechanisms for the sandbox, such as access controls, data sanitization, and malware detection.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the secure data sandbox, including file upload, analysis initiation, and result visualization.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and develop the data storage and management system for the sandbox, including secure storage of files, analysis results, and audit logs.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the project, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the secure data sandbox, covering unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform regular security audits on the secure data sandbox to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the secure data sandbox, including user guides, technical documentation, and deployment instructions.
